name: All About <???>
description:
In all about you play as a streaming unit operator, in this job you'll have to help your unit navigate the ETHER. In this metaphysical space you'll encounter a lot of foes that want to bring you down and steal your soul.

This project was the result of a 2 week game jam where the themes were "Waifu Hunt" and "Steal An Asset". The game has a lot of bugs and I'm not happy with the final product, but well it is what it is...
